attributes.action: Begin an operation to evacuate members of LGBT+ community in Chechnya.
attributes.additional_details:
Just some of the reports on this horrific attack on basic human rights:

http://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/europe/chechnya-gay-men-concentration-camps-torture-detain-nazi-ramzan-kadyrov-chechen-russia-region-a7677901.html  

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-39566136

https://www.nytimes.com/2017/04/01/world/europe/chechen-authorities-arresting-and-killing-gay-men-russian-paper-says.html
attributes.background: Hundreds of gay men in Chechnya have been being attacked and/or killed by law for their sexual orientation. The UK acknowledges that sexual orientation is not choice & equality of LGBT+ people is basic human right. We should stand up for these innocents-offering an evacuation scheme to protect them.
